column5: Beautiful home for enjoying the outdoors with lovely views, patio, & pool and hot home cooked breakfast served daily. Playground and Lakeshore trails available within walking distance. 3 bedrooms upstairs with comfortable queen beds and full bathroom with shower and tub. Close proximity to Lake Lewisville, Five-Star Athletic Park, Grandscape, Nebraska Furniture Mart, Hawaiian Falls Waterpark, Sam Rayburn Tollway, I-35E and Dallas North Tollway.
column8: Perfect for Families--3 Bedrooms, Pool, Playground
